block_list.title: Video Tutorial
block_list.body: This is Paper plane 16 of our 100 Exotic Paper Airplane Challenge. Hunter designed by Kunihiko Kasahara. This is an origami plane folded from a square sheet. If you missed my last Exotic Paper Airplane "Paper Plane 015 : Tri Plane by Nick Robinson", you could watch it at https://youtu.be/e9fm86pwLGo Thanks for watching! Wilson Lee @Heap Art
